title: Torch
content:
Torch Common 1~4 Damage 1d4 Bludgeoning+ 1d4 Fire Burning: Takes 1d4 Fire damage per turn. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A deep oily smell wafts from this crude tree branch. Club Light 0.9 10

1d4 Bludgeoning+ 1d4 Fire

Burning: Takes 1d4 Fire damage per turn.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A deep oily smell wafts from this crude tree branch.
